select userinfo.id,userinfo.uid,userjjc.score,usergame.tili, usergame.ugold,usergame.ucharge,usergame.diamond from userinfo,userjjc,usergame where userinfo.uid = #{uid} and userjjc.uid = #{uid} and usergame.uid =#{uid}
